title: Åmot IF
text:
Åmot Idrettsforening is a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> multisports club located in <a href="%C3%85mot%2C%20Buskerud">Åmot</a>. It has sections for <a href="boxing">boxing</a>, <a href="handball">handball</a>, <a href="association%20football">football</a> and <a href="cross-country%20skiing%20%28sport%29">cross-country skiing</a>.
The football team being the most prominent, it played in the <a href="Norwegian%20Second%20Division">Second Division</a> as late as <a href="2007%20Norwegian%20Second%20Division">2007</a>, but for the next season its first team merged with others to become <a href="Modum%20FK">Modum FK</a>. Hence, Åmot's second team in the Fourth Division emerged as its new first team. In the 2008 season Åmot was runner up in Fourth Division and was promoted to <a href="Norwegian%20Third%20Division">Third Division</a>. Åmot was relegated in <a href="2009%20Norwegian%20Third%20Division">2009</a>.
